meanings.sent1: Her unplaited hair flowed freely down her back.
meanings.sent2: The rope was left unplaited and lay in a tangled mess.
meanings.sent3: The unplaited shoelaces caused him to trip comically.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like unplaited threads, scattered and disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The unplaited fabric fluttered in the wind, resembling a flag of freedom.

meanings.sent1: The unplaited vines grew wildly in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The unplaited basket fell apart as soon as it was lifted.
meanings.sent3: The unplaited wires in the electronics made a buzzing sound.
meanings.sent4: Her unplaited emotions were a jumble of conflicting feelings.
meanings.sent5: The unplaited branches of the tree reached out like crooked fingers.
